entry.title: where to go from here
entry.content:
Nothing's new

I always thought that reudcing the number of blogs I 'maintained' would result in better and more quality blogposts in the remaining few. Now I know that is not true.

The average amount of inspiration is not rising when fewer posts are written. It stays roughly the same.

Poor quality

The number of poor quality-posts has no influence on the average quality.

Ah well, whatever. There is still no vision or idea behind this blog. There is no clue where to go from here. Nobody knows. And frankly, I really don't think anobody cares. Maybe I should, but I see no reason why.

Nothing has changed since the last time I wrote a blog here. 'till next time.
